name: Decorous Harmony
description: When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and you trigger Flying Cloud Flag Formation: If you have no cards in your Hand, this Skill deals +2 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: When $[A1607], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and you trigger <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116073]</color>: If you have no cards in your Hand, this Skill deals +2 additional DMG.
descriptionreplaced: When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and you trigger <color=#FFFFFFFF>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color>: If you have no cards in your Hand, this Skill deals +2 additional DMG.
